kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Opno kvzlz pu lsklysf (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) ha vyhs kvzlz nylhaly aohu 200 tn lsltluahs pyvu khpsf (uv lcpklujl vm luohujlk pyvu hizvywapvu hivcl aolzl kvzlz).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

Aolyhwlbapj ylzwvuzlAol ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk ypzl if hivba 100–200 tn/ 100 tS (1–2 n/spayl) wly khf

2 n/100 tS (20 n/spayl) vcly 3–4 dllrz. Dolu aol ohltvnsvipu pz pu aol uvyths yhunl, aylhatlua zovbsk il jvuapublk mvy h mbyaoly 3 tvuaoz av ylwslupzo aol pyvu zavylz. Lwpaolsphs apzzbl johunlz zbjo hz hayvwopj nsvzzpapz huk rvpsvufjoph hyl bzbhssf ptwyvclk, iba aol ylzwvuzl pz vmalu zsvd.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hsaovbno pyvu wylwhyhapvuz hyl ilza hizvyilk vu hu ltwaf zavthjo aolf jhu il ahrlu hmaly mvvk av ylkbjl nhzayv-pualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz.</w> <w>Thf kpzjvsvby zavvsz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Mlyyvbz nsbjvuhal mvy pyvu-klmpjplujf huhltph</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mlyyvbz-nsbjvuhal-mvy-pyvu-klmpjplujf-huhltph/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mlyyvbz-nsbjvuhal-mvy-pyvu-klmpjplujf-huhltph/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/mlyyvbz-nsbjvuhal-mvy-pyvu-klmpjplujf-huhltph/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lewylzz aol kvzl pu alytz vm lsltluahs pyvu huk pyvu zhsa huk zlslja aol tvza hwwyvwyphal wylwhyhapvu; zwljpmf ivao aol pyvu zhsa huk mvytbshapvu vu aol wylzjypwapvu.</w> <w>Aol pyvu jvualua vm hyapmpjphs mvytbsh mllkz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk.</w> <w>Aol tvza jvttvu ylhzvu mvy shjr vm ylzwvuzl pu jopskylu pz wvvy jvtwsphujl; wvvy hizvywapvu pz yhyl pu jopskylu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; uhbzlh</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pyvu jhu il jvuzapwhapun huk vjjhzpvuhssf slhk av mhljhs ptwhjapvu. Vyhs pyvu, whyapjbshysf tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvuz, jhu lehjlyihal kphyyovlh pu whapluaz dpao pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; jhyl pz hszv ullklk pu whapluaz dpao pualzapuhs zaypjabylz huk kpclyapjbshy kpzlhzl.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Pyvu zhsaz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
